item.title: I have obtained a position at French CNRS
item.description: In the continuity of my MSCA fellowship, I’ve been hired by the French CNRS (Section 11) as a tenured full time researcher at LIPhy (UGA).

item.title: New MSCA project NanoSep starting at UGA
item.description: After 2 great years at the ICP in Stuttgart, I am starting my own MSCA project (NanoSep) at LIPhy (UGA) in Benoit Coasne group.
